text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
(It feels as if all of the blood coursing<n>through me freezes to
a stop.)

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
(Yet, my face always feels so hot. My<n>legs quiver, and my
whole body<n>begins to throb. It's so deafening,<n>and I just
want it to stop...)

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: (Stop, stop, STOP!)

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Bright
text_block_list.text: —ber... Dober!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Bright
text_block_list.text: Dober!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: Gasp!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Bright
text_block_list.text:
Dober, is something the matter?<n>They've already called
your group to<n>the starting gate.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: Ah, s-sorry. I'll get going.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Bright
text_block_list.text:
...You're looking a little pale, Dober. If<n>you are not feeling
well, then—

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: I'm fine, really.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
I'm fine. Don't worry about me. It's<n>just a scrimmage
race.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: This is nothing for me.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Mejiro Dober is taking part in a<n>scrimmage race with some
of the<n>other students today. Naturally, I've<n>decided to
accompany the chief trainer<n>in the stands.
choice_data_list:
I was sure that she was feeling fine just before
this...

text_block_list.name: Chief Trainer
text_block_list.text:
Indeed, but let's observe carefully.<n>They're about to start
now.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: My concern for her well-being will<n>soon become justified.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Clank!

text_block_list.name: Spectators
text_block_list.text:
The inside! Head for the inside! Save<n>your energy! Keep it
up! Go for it, sis!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: Huff... huff... gasp!
choice_data_list: (What?!)

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Mejiro Dober's performance in this<n>scrimmage race is
unfortunately a far<n>cry from the refined running I saw<n>from
her before.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
(Don't look, don't look! Don't you<n>even think about looking
at the stands!<n>I have to concentrate... Concentrate<n>on the
race, and then...)

text_block_list.name: Spectators
text_block_list.text: Wooooo!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: Gasp!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Mejiro Dober finds herself unable to<n>muster the kind of run
she had<n>achieved many times before, finishing<n>in a
lackluster eighth place.

text_block_list.name: Chief Trainer
text_block_list.text:
Bell... It would seem that as a young<n>child, she had a
number of bad<n>experiences that caused her to<n>become
quite nervous around others<n>now.

text_block_list.name: Chief Trainer
text_block_list.text:
Even so, she dedicated herself to her<n>training while avoiding
prying eyes.<n>The Mejiro estate has plenty of open<n>space
that afforded her the<n>opportunity.

text_block_list.name: Chief Trainer
text_block_list.text:
She became so used to training only<n>around her maids and
family<n>members... Now she struggles to<n>compose herself
in front of large<n>crowds and especially men.

text_block_list.name: Chief Trainer
text_block_list.text:
So on a day like today, I understand<n>why she wasn't able
to show off the<n>fruits of her training.

text_block_list.name: Chief Trainer
text_block_list.text:
Wanting to enter these races, wanting<n>to win as badly as
she does... It must<n>be so tough for her. But then again...

text_block_list.name: Chief Trainer
text_block_list.text: She never gives up, that girl.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I can't help but ruminate on the chief<n>trainer's words even
days after the<n>scrimmage races. One afternoon,<n>while
dining in the cafeteria at<n>lunchtime...

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: Is it okay if I sit here?
choice_data_list: Huh?! Y-yeah, sure!
Huh?! Y-yes, of course!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
That's a bit of an overreaction...<n>Maybe it figures, though,
given how I<n>don't think we've ever even made<n>direct eye
contact before.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
I'm sorry for suddenly approaching<n>you like this, given
we've never so<n>much as made direct eye contact<n>before.
It's just that... I'm pretty shy.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
I just know that I would face a repeat<n>of that scrimmage
race if I just let<n>things be, however.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
I just know that I would face a repeat<n>of that scrimmage
race if I just let<n>things be, however.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
So I was thinking that talking to you<n>could be some good
mental training<n>for me! You can do that much as my<n>
assistant trainer, right?
choice_data_list: Of course. I'd be happy to help.
Of course. I'd be happy to help.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
So I was hoping... maybe I could talk<n>with you to help me
build some mental<n>fortitude. Would that be okay?
choice_data_list: Of course. I'd be happy to help.
Of course. I'd be happy to help.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: ...Thanks.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: Thank you, and sorry again...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The chief trainer's assessment of<n>Mejiro Dober's resolve
is certainly<n>accurate—she really is trying her best.<n>A
conversation topic comes to me in<n>an instant.
choice_data_list: What made you decide to join the racing world?
What made you decide to join the racing world?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The chief trainer's assessment of<n>Mejiro Dober's resolve
is certainly<n>accurate—she really is trying her best.<n>A
conversation topic comes to me in<n>an instant.
choice_data_list: What made you decide to join the racing world?
What made you decide to join the racing world?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: Why start with that...

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: Huh? This is sudden. Um...

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
This may... sound pretty cliché, but as<n>a Mejiro, it was the
world I grew up in<n>close proximity to. It was easy to<n>
admire it, and I grew to want to<n>succeed in it myself.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
This may... sound pretty cliché, but as<n>a Mejiro, it was the
world I grew up in<n>close proximity to. It was easy to<n>
admire it, and I grew to want to<n>succeed in it myself.

text_block_list.name: Young Dober
text_block_list.text:
Ryan! Hey hey, Ryan! I want to race<n>too! Let me race with
you!

text_block_list.name: Young Ryan
text_block_list.text: Wh-whoa, Dober? What's gotten into<n>you all of a sudden?

text_block_list.name: Young Dober
text_block_list.text: I want to race! Just like you!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: I felt that I was born to run and win.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
For something that she has labeled<n>as cliché, I cannot help
but notice the<n>sheer determination in her eyes.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
If I can't even properly run in a race,<n>though, then all this
time and effort<n>I've spent to realize my dream will<n>have all
been for naught. I have to<n>become stronger.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
My trainer's been doing everything<n>she can to support me.
I simply must<n>hurry up and show her I can win!
choice_data_list: I know that you have what it takes to win!
I know that you have what it takes to win!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: What? How can you just say that so<n>casually?
choice_data_list: Because I really believe it!
I really believe that you do.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
Mm... While I'm happy to hear you<n>say that, I'm just still so
weak...
choice_data_list: Because I really believe it!
I really believe that you do.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: Gasp!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: Gasp!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: ...Is that so?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
I don't think... I've met anyone quite<n>like you before. Trainer
is the only<n>other person to put as much faith in<n>me.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
Hey, so after we're done eating, can<n>you come with me for
a bit? I want to<n>sign up for my next scrimmage race.<n>
That's another thing you can do as<n>an assistant trainer,
right?
choice_data_list: Sure, let's go.
Okay, let's go.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
Oh, after we're done eating, would<n>you mind coming along
with me? I'd<n>like to sign up for my next scrimmage<n>race, if
you don't mind.
choice_data_list: Sure, let's go.
Okay, let's go.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: I'll show you what I'm truly capable<n>of this time.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
Thank you. I'd like to show everyone<n>what I'm truly
capable of. You<n>included.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I feel as though I've gotten just a<n>touch closer with Mejiro
Dober, even<n>if our encounter was a little bit<n>awkward.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I feel as though I've gotten just a<n>touch closer with Mejiro
Dober, even<n>if our encounter was a little bit<n>awkward.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: It would soon prove to be only the<n>beginning.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: It would soon prove to be only the<n>beginning.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
"Excuse me, Trainer? Are we going to<n>start the day's
session—Trainer? Are<n>you... sleeping?"

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: ...?! Trainer? Trainer?! Are you okay?!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: S-somebody! Somebody please help,<n>Trainer's—
